QuestData.Title: Now or Never
QuestData.Description:
In a fair fight our warriors could stand against countless swarms of these Maldraxxi.
This was no fair fight, outsider.
They came without warning. Without cause. We were caught unprepared.
They must not be allowed to encroach any further. This stops here.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Thanikos in Xandria's Vigil.
QuestData.RewardText: We have bought a staging ground, but much remains to be done.
